name: innerstanding
description:
innerstanding is atmospheric, abstract puzzle game that talks about an idea of letting go.

let go of what holds you. find a new innerstandings, shift your perspective and take it from another angle in peace and acceptance.

game by - Jan Hugo Ronovský

music and sfx - Matteo Ruggiero

created as a term project on gameart
